name: The Island: King's Order Demo
description:
Description:

The island is a combination of an RTS game and an RPG game where you play as an army commander and as a hero of your choice.
You will have to build the base, expand your army and defend the settlement at all costs.

Fight the nearby monsters in the name of King Actus,
And kill any monster that crosses your path.
But be careful with each passing day the monsters get stronger and more vicious.

After two years of hard work, our demo is finally ready for you guys to try out!

Things to do in the demo:

  1. Select your hero
  2. Build the base
  3. Manage your resources
  4. Conquer new lands
  5. Defeat all the monsters

If you have any thoughts on the game, if you found bugs or anything really you can leave a comment here or join our discord server!
